706580.name: Tokyo Dark: Collector’s Upgrade
706580.description:
Tokyo Dark: Collector’s Upgrade includes the game's full digital soundtrack, alongside a PDF art book containing imagery from throughout the game's development process.

Tokyo Dark OST
